memories.title: The Day We Met
memories.description: I still remember how nervous I was. You smiled at me, and everything else just... faded away. That was the moment I knew something extraordinary was beginning.

memories.title: Our First Date
memories.description: We talked for hours and it felt like minutes. I couldn't stop looking at your eyes. You laughed at my terrible jokes and I fell a little more with each one.

memories.title: Our First Adventure
memories.description: Just you and me against the world. Every wrong turn became a new discovery, every moment became a memory I'll cherish forever.

memories.title: Three Little Words
memories.description: My heart was racing so fast. When those words finally left my lips, and you said them back... that was the most perfect moment of my life.

memories.title: Our Little World
memories.description: It doesn't matter where we are â€” as long as I'm with you, I'm home. This was the moment I realized that. Wrapped in blankets, your head on my shoulder, everything was exactly right.
